trans-unit.source: Represents a class that is used as an argument to set the state of a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Reprezentuje klasę, która jest używana jako argument do ustawiania stanu <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> allows for setting the state from the host application.
This enables the host application to override the current state of a state machine.
trans-unit.target: Dzięki temu aplikacja hosta zastąpić bieżący stan komputera stanu.

trans-unit.source: This can be accomplished by enqueuing an instance of the SetStateEventArgs class to the WorkflowQueue named by the constant <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.SetStateQueueName?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Można to zrobić przez wystąpienie SetStateEventArgs klasy do WorkflowQueue o nazwie stała <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.SetStateQueueName?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.SetStateQueueName?displayProperty=fullName> enqueuing

trans-unit.source: A simpler way to accomplish this is to use the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.SetState%2A> method in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance> class.
trans-unit.target: Jest prostszy sposób, w tym celu użyć tej <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.SetState%2A>metody w <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance>klasie.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.SetState%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.SetState%2A> method to perform a SetState operation from the host, or you can do it yourself by enqueuing an event to the state machine workflow as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: Można użyć <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.SetState%2A>metodę, aby wykonać operację metoda SetState z hosta, lub zrobić to samodzielnie przez enqueuing zdarzenie, aby przepływ pracy automatu stanów jak pokazano w poniższym przykładzie.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.SetState%2A>

trans-unit.source: ``` public void SetState(string targetStateName) { if (targetStateName == null) { throw new ArgumentNullException("targetStateName"); } SetStateEventArgs args1 = new SetStateEventArgs(targetStateName); this.WorkflowInstance.EnqueueItemOnIdle("SetStateQueue", args1, null, null); } ``` The state machine workflow uses a special queue called `SetStateQueue` to listen to these special events.
trans-unit.target: ``` public void SetState(string targetStateName) { if (targetStateName == null) { throw new ArgumentNullException("targetStateName"); } SetStateEventArgs args1 = new SetStateEventArgs(targetStateName); this.WorkflowInstance.EnqueueItemOnIdle("SetStateQueue", args1, null, null); } ```Przepływ pracy automatu stanów używa specjalnych kolejki o nazwie `SetStateQueue` do nasłuchiwania na te zdarzenia specjalnych.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateEventArgs"></xref> class.
The state to set the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> to.
Gets the state to set the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> to.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera stan używany do ustawiania <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> do.

trans-unit.source: The state to set the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> to.
